title: Bride and Prejudice's Codie Lea, 21, reveals her cosmetic procedures
text:
She was branded 'fake' and called a 'plastic c**t' by her mother-in-law Laurelle on Wednesday's episode of Bride and Prejudice.

And now Codie Lea Lynch is coming clean about her cosmetic surgery procedures and extreme body makeover.

In a searingly honest Instagram post, the 21-year-old confirmed that she's had lip fillers and a breast augmentation - but insisted the rest of her is natural.

Nothing to hide: Bride and Prejudice's Codie Lea Lynch (pictured) has come clean about her cosmetic surgery procedures and extreme body makeover

'I am quite happy to talk about this as I am confident in my choices with my body and like to [share] education and self love [with] other people,' she wrote.

'The only thing I've touched on my face is my lips with some filler, everything else is natural and I intend to keep it this way.

'As for the rest of my body, I had a breast augmentation to fill my body out to a more proportional shape for when I'm competing on stage with my bikini bodybuilding.'

'I had a breast augmentation to fill my body out to a more proportional shape': The young mum, 21, confirmed that she's had a boob job to help with her bikini bodybuilding competitions

Natural beauty: 'The only thing I've touched on my face is my lips with some filler, everything else is natural and I intend to keep it this way,' she wrote on Instagram

Codie added: 'These are my personal choices which I love... I am a strong believer in doing something that will give you more confidence and self love.'

The mother-of-one then urged women to 'support our fellow ladies and help build each other up' instead of tearing each other down.

'If it does not harm you and if it doesn't affect you, please don't shame another woman for making a personal choice of her own,' she concluded.

'We don't need to be each other's worst enemies in this world full of nastiness.'

Empowering: Codie urged women to 'support our fellow ladies and help build each other up' instead of tearing each other down

On Wednesday's Bride and Prejudice, 'mother-in-law from hell' Laurelle called Codie Lea a 'plastic c**t' during a tense confrontation.

In another shocking scene, she threatened to take her son Nathan to court for visitation rights to see her granddaughter, Starr-Armani.

'Codie is a plastic Barbie girl and I don't think she's human,' Laurelle said.

'She has taken my son and my granddaughter away, and if she was on fire I wouldn't even spit on her... I hate her guts.'

The tension between Laurelle and the young couple stems from a feud involving baby Starr-Armani.

'Codie is a plastic Barbie girl and I don't think she's human': 'Mother-in-law from hell' Laurelle lashed out at her son Nathan's fiancée on Wednesday's episode of Bride and Prejudice

According to Codie, Laurelle came into her home while she was sleeping and took an unvaccinated Starr-Armani out shopping without permission when she was just three weeks old.

However, Laurelle maintains that Nathan had asked her to babysit Starr that day.

'I don't deserve to have restrictions on my granddaughter,' she said. 'I'll do what it takes to see my granddaughter, but I'm not going to bow down to a 20-year-old plastic b***h.'

No boundaries: According to Codie, Laurelle came into her home while she was sleeping and took her unvaccinated baby daughter, Starr-Armani, out shopping without permission

'I don't deserve to have restrictions!' Laurelle (pictured) said she will do 'whatever it takes to see [her] granddaughter'

During a tense sit-down with her son, Laurelle threatened to take the couple to court for 'grandma rights' to see Starr.

'There's no such thing!' Nathan responded.

'If it goes to court, I have just as much right to see my granddaughter as you do!' Laurelle shot back.

'You have as much right as I give you!' Nathan said. 'We're her parents and that's how it works.'

Visitation: During a tense sit-down with her son, Laurelle threatened to take the couple to court for 'grandma rights' to see Starr

'There's no such thing!' her son Nathan responded

When Codie-Lea arrived to join the conversation, Laurelle unleashed on her future daughter-in-law with a string of expletives.

'Why is that you will never accept me?' asked a stunned Codie.

'Because you're a plastic b***h!' raged Laurelle. 'Everything on you is fake. Fake hair, fake lips, fake boobs, fake eyelashes, fake tan - you're plastic!'

'Why is that you will never accept me?' asked Codie during her confrontation with Laurelle

'Because you're a plastic b***h!' said Laurelle. 'Everything on you is fake. Fake hair, fake lips, fake boobs, fake eyelashes, fake tan - you're plastic!'

Keeping her cool, Codie responded: 'I'd rather be fake on the outside than fake on the inside. You're behaving so stupid.'

Flying into a rage, Laurelle then branded Codie a 'plastic c**t' and vowed 'never to accept' her.

Channel Seven's Bride and Prejudice continues Thursday from 7.30pm
